name: Bruised
description:
A short puzzlescript game about pushing all cubes at once with the cube being pushed becoming bruised after you move away from it.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=e69f9c6acda602e632c3ae2397f65801

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=e69f9c6acda602e632c3ae2397f65801

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
